check.cantUseSkillRecquired: cannot be used without at least 1 add in the required skill.
check.cantUseUntrained: cannot be used unless it is learned (at least 1 skill add).
check.cantUseRealityWhileDisconnected: You cannot use the reality skill as long as you are disconnected
check.interactionNeedTarget: Cannot attempt interaction attack test without a target. Select a target and try again.
check.needTarget: Cannot attempt enhanced attack test without a target. Select a target and try again.
check.noTracker: Cannot use chase button unless there is an active combat in the combat tracker.

chatText.notPermittedDSR: Next DSR step {step} not permitted by Drama Card
chatText.noAmmo: Failed to fire your weapon, no bullets left.
chatText.noAmmoPosessing: You do not have any ammunitions in your inventory. Failed to proceed.
chatText.notSufficientAmmo: You do not have a sufficent amount of bullets in your weapon to use this burst attack, this test cannot be performed.
chatText.mayCauseContradiction: Perks with this symbol are dependent on their cosmâ€™s World Laws and can cause Contradictions outside that cosm.
chatText.ammoFull: The weapon "{a}" is already fully loaded.

combat.toggleDramatic: Toggle between Standard and Dramatic Combat Resolution
combat.hasPlayedTooltip: Check when character's turn is complete

core.forceDarkModeHint: TORG only works with Applications set to Dark mode

defeat.good:
{name} is Knocked Out

They suffer an Injury that lasts until all Wounds are healed
defeat.standard:
{name} is Knocked Out

They suffer a permanent Injury
defeat.failure:
{name} dies!

They get one final, dramatic action before expiring (ignoring wound penalties)

dialogPrompts.return: Returns all cards to their deck(s). Does NOT automatically reshuffle the deck(s).

externalLinks.content: Need help? Want to report a bug? Here are a few usefull links.
externalLinks.title: Links

hideForeignCompendium.content: This system includes both English and German language compendiums. Do you want to hide foreign language compendiums?
hideForeignCompendium.title: Hide foreign languages Compendiums?

itemDeletion.content: Are you sure you want to delete this? It will be permanently removed from the sheet.
itemDeletion.title: Confirm Deletion

raceDeletion.content: Are you sure you want to delete this? It will be permanently removed from the sheet and all racial perks will be deleted as well.
raceDeletion.title: Confirm Deletion

chooseAmmo.maintext: Please choose the ammunition you want to use to reload your weapon.

dragDropDriver.maintext: Does this character want to drive this vehicle?

showingDramaCards.nbCardsValue: Number of cards to show to player

cardRetour.cardOwner: Who will get the the last played card back ?

buffMacro.choose: Which attribute do you want to modify ?
buffMacro.value: Choose the value for the bonus

raceDiminishAttribute.maintext: The attribute {attribute} is greater than the race maximum. Should the attribute be set to the race maximum?
raceDiminishAttribute.title: Warning, attribute maximum

drama.flurryDesc: FLURRY: {faction} get an extra turn this round
drama.upDesc: UP: Add an additional roll to the first roll for {faction}
drama.confusedDesc: CONFUSED: Players are unable to play cards from their pool
drama.fatiguedDesc: FATIGUED: Two shock inflicted at the end of each {faction} turn
drama.setbackDesc: SETBACK: GM decides a suitable setback for {faction}
drama.stymiedDesc: STYMIED: All {faction} are stymied until the end of the their turn
drama.surgeDesc: SURGE: All {faction} must check for Contradications

itemTraits.label: Traits
itemTraits.hint: The specific abilities of this item

gmScreen.noScreenMessage: you don't have selected any gm screen. The gm screens are provided by the modules that you can find here:
gmScreen.title: GM screen

iconeTitles.reload:
Reload weapon

(hold SHIFT for free reload)

notifications.dramaDeckEmpty: The Drama Deck is empty. Reset the Drama Deck to continue.
notifications.macroTypeWarning: You can only create macro buttons for owned Items and Attributes/Skills
notifications.moduleNotActive: Activate the module to see desscription.
notifications.noActiveEffectInOwnedItem: Managing Active Effects within an Owned Item is not currently supported and will be added in a subsequent update.
notifications.noAttrNamed: Your controlled Actor does not have an attribute named
notifications.noItemNamed: Your controlled Actor does not have an item named
notifications.noRaceToDelete: There is no race to delete.
notifications.noSkillNamed: Your controlled Actor does not have a skill named
notifications.noTokenNorActor: No tokens selected and no assigned character found, the macro cannot proceed.
notifications.noVehicleOperator: The targeted vehicle {a} doesn't have an operator. The test cannot proceed.
notifications.onlyReservedCard: Please play a reserved card while playing a dramatic scene
notifications.openDiscord: Your browser will open a new page to join us on our discord server
notifications.openIssue: Your browser will open a new page to complete an issue
notifications.openUlisses: Your browser will open a new tab to join Ulisses website
notifications.failureBDResolution: The system failed to resolute the BD
notifications.ammoValueExceedsMax: The actual ammo value of the weapon {a} exceeds it's max value. The value will be reduced to it's maximum.
notifications.noCapacity: {a} can't pilote this kind of vehicle!
notifications.noFight: No active combat, or not started
notifications.raceExistent: You have already chosen a race.
notifications.notAPerkItem: You attempted to assign a perk from the {a} category to this race, but it must belong to the racial category. Action has been aborted.
notifications.reachedMaximumAttr: You have reached the attribute maximum specified by your race. A further increase is not possible.
notifications.clipEmpty: This ammunition is empty and cannot be used for reloading.

partySheet.chooseParty: Choose whether you want to see ALL players, or only the ACTIVE players
partySheet.noCharacter: This user doesn't own any actor

perks.generalContradictionTT: Cause Contradictions outside of its Cosm.

possibilitiesReset.hint: How many possibilities should the StormKnights get?
possibilitiesReset.name: Reset Storm Knight Possibilities

animatedChat.hint: If checked, enable chat card animations. Changing this setting will reload the app
animatedChat.name: Chat Card Animation

useColorBlindnessColors.hint: If activated, the game uses daltonistism friendly red and green colors.
useColorBlindnessColors.name: Use daltonism (colorblind)- friendly colors

useRenderedTorgDice.hint: If activated, the Dice in Chat-Cards will be Torgish. If disabled, they're standard-foundry-grey.
useRenderedTorgDice.name: Show Torg-Dice in chatcards

autoDamages.hint: If checked, shocks and wounds would be automatically apply if player has a valid target token. WARNING: This feature only works correctly with initial damage rolls. It will not correctly record subsequent bonus die rolls. Use with caution.
autoDamages.name: Apply damages automatically

deckSetting.hint: Configure the names that are used for your card decks and discard piles.
deckSetting.label: Default card deck configuration
deckSetting.name: Default card deck configuration

disableXP.hint: If checked, only GM should be able to fill XP in character sheet.
disableXP.name: Disabling the XP input for players

gmScreen.hint: You can select a GM screen from any active module.
gmScreen.name: Select the GM Screen You Want to Use

hideForeignCompendium.hint: Select to hide all compendium in foreign language
hideForeignCompendium.name: Hide foreign Compendiums

pauseMedia.hint: Choose the image that is displayed when the game is paused.
pauseMedia.name: Pause Image Media

playerHandBottom.hint: Player hands open at the bottom right of the screen, and cards will appear above the player hand window. Requires screen refresh (F5) to take effect.
playerHandBottom.name: Player Hand Bottom Display

setupCards.hint: If checked, the system will re-set the decks and discard piles in the Card Stacks tab. You will need to refresh your browser before the changes are made.
setupCards.name: Setup the Cards Directory

showCheckDetails.hint: If checked, the details of checks will always be shown.
showCheckDetails.name: Show Details in checks

welcome.hint: If checked, the welcome message will pop up after your world loads.
welcome.name: Display the Welcome Message

uniqueDN.hint: If checked, when a multi-target test is done, will keep the highest DN from all targets to determine outcome, as RAW.
uniqueDN.name: Unique DN

unTarget.hint: Targets are reseted after an attack by default. Uncheck if you want to keep them.
unTarget.name: Cancel targeting

useYear1PPTent.hint: Use the Pan-Pacifica tabletent after year 1.
useYear1PPTent.name: Year-1 PP TT

cardChatNotify.hint: Hides core Foundry card messages where Torg Eternity supplies its own message
cardChatNotify.name: Suppress Core Card Messages

shuffleMessageSurpress.hint: If checked, the Chat Message on shuffling cards will be suppressed.
shuffleMessageSurpress.name: Suppress Chatmessage on shuffle

ignoreAmmo.hint: If checked, rules and mechanics for reloading Ammo are totally ignored.
ignoreAmmo.name: Ignore ammo mechanics

hoverDistance.hint: If checked, hovering the mouse over a token will display the distance to that token from the user's controlled character
hoverDistance.name: Show Distance to Token

rulerGridWalk.hint: The tint colour for grid cells when a token has not reached its move distance (default: --color-level-success)
rulerGridWalk.name: Grid Highlight (Walk)

rulerGridRun.hint: The tint colour for grid cells when a token has exceeded its move, but not its max move (default: --color-level-info)
rulerGridRun.name: Grid Highlight (Run)

rulerGridMax.hint: The tint colour for grid cells when a token has exceeded its max move (default: --color-level-error)
rulerGridMax.name: Grid Highlight (> Run)

showMovementRuler.hint: Displays the movement history of tokens during a combat round (history is cleared on a new round)
showMovementRuler.name: Show Token Movement History

autoShock.name: Automatically Apply KO
autoShock.hint: Automatically set an actor to unconscious whenever their shock is exceeded

autoWound.name: Automatically Apply Wounds
autoWound.hint: Automatically set a threat or vehicle token to Dead when its wounds are exceeded

autoDisconnect.name: Automatically Disconnect
autoDisconnect.hint: On a Surge or Test check that causes Disconnection, the actor will automatically be set to disconnected

dramaCardUp.name: UP only from Drama Card
dramaCardUp.hint: Hide the UP button in Test Check results if the current Drama Card doesn't have UP in the conflict line (default true)

sheetLabels.enhancementAddTooltip: Add available enhancement to end of list
sheetLabels.explosionCancelled: You were disfavored, first bonus die has been cancelled, but you're no more disfavored.
sheetLabels.favoredTitle: Check this if the skill is favored

sheetLabels.trademarkHint: Trademark Weapon Perk for the used weapon

sheetLabels.usePreviousBonusText: Input BONUS NUMBER from previous test, not die total.
sheetLabels.toolTipClickToAdd: click to add/remove the skill to the access list

skillDialogs.disfavoredTip: Check if this test is disfavored. The die roll will not explode on a 10 or 20.
skillDialogs.favoredTip: Check if this test is favored for some unexpected reason.

macros.commonMacroNoValue: No value entered. The macro cannot compute.

macros.bonusDieMacroNoDiscon: There is no disconnected status on this character.
